content: Jassim Happa - Royal Holloway Research Portal Jassim Happa Dr Senior Lecturer in Information Security, Department of Information Security https://orcid.org/0000-0002-0860-5130 Phone+44 1784 276863EmailJassim.Happarhul.acuk TW20 0EX Personal profile Personal profileDr Jassim Happa has an extensive research background in both cyber security and computer graphics. His research focuses on developing tools and methods to support human and machine decision making. In cyber security his research topics include: visual analytics, resilience, network defences with machine learning, Cyber Threat Intelligence (CTI), privacy and human factors. In computer graphics, his research topics include: high-fidelity rendering, virtual archaeology, high dynamic range imaging, data visualization and human-computer interaction.
